content: Say I build the exact same revision as a rustc release, beta or nightly, with a small patch that doesn't matter for stdlib/core, etc. Can I use that local build with the stdlib/core etc. from the rustc release, beta or nightly? (asking because I'd like to test a patch when targeting android, and I don't feel like setting things up to build stdlib and core for android)
I guess I could just patch out the thing that errors out when it finds the std doesn't match the compiler version.
